general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.description: This Privacy Policy determines the procedure for processing personal data of Ad Lab service users. Using the service means agreeing to the terms of this policy.
general.contact: The service administrator is not a natural person, legal entity, or self-employed individual. For privacy-related questions, contact us through the feedback forms on the website.
general.compliance: Personal data processing is carried out in accordance with Federal Law No. 152-FZ "On Personal Data" and other applicable regulatory acts of the Russian Federation.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect the following categories of personal data:
dataCollection.personalData: Personal data: name, email address provided during registration
dataCollection.technicalData: Technical data: IP address, browser type, operating system, cookies
dataCollection.usageData: Usage data: request history, preferences, service interaction
dataCollection.paymentData: Payment data: transaction information through Telegram (Tribute), subscription status

purposes.title: 3. Data Processing Purposes
purposes.serviceProvision: Providing and supporting Ad Lab service functionality
purposes.userSupport: Technical user support and handling inquiries
purposes.paymentProcessing: Payment processing and subscription management through Telegram (Tribute)
purposes.serviceImprovement: Service usage analysis for improvement and development
purposes.legal: Fulfilling legal obligations and protecting legitimate interests

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.consent: Consent of the personal data subject to process their personal data
legalBasis.contract: Performance of a contract to which the data subject is a party
legalBasis.legitimate: Legitimate interests of the personal data controller
legalBasis.legal: Performance of legal obligations imposed on the controller

payments.title: 5. Payment Processing
payments.description: Payments are processed through the Telegram platform using the Tribute service. We do not have access to complete payment card data.
payments.tribute: Tribute processes payments in accordance with Telegram's privacy policy and applicable payment industry security standards.
payments.security: All payment operations are protected by modern encryption methods and comply with international security standards.

sharing.title: 6. Data Sharing with Third Parties
sharing.description: We may share your personal data with third parties only in the following cases:
sharing.serviceProviders: Service providers necessary for service operation (hosting, analytics)
sharing.legal: Upon request of authorized government agencies in cases provided by law
sharing.consent: With your explicit consent for such sharing

storage.title: 7. Data Retention Periods
storage.description: Personal data is stored no longer than necessary for processing purposes, unless otherwise provided by law.
storage.retention: After account deletion, data may be retained for 3 years to fulfill legal obligations, after which it will be permanently deleted.

rights.title: 8. Data Subject Rights
rights.access: Right to obtain information about personal data processing
rights.rectification: Right to clarification, blocking or destruction of inaccurate data
rights.erasure: Right to deletion of personal data
rights.restriction: Right to restriction of personal data processing
rights.portability: Right to obtain personal data in a structured format
rights.objection: Right to object to personal data processing
rights.withdraw: Right to withdraw consent to personal data processing

cookies.title: 9. Use of Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve service performance:
cookies.necessary: Necessary cookies to ensure basic functionality
cookies.analytics: Analytics cookies to understand user behavior

security.title: 10. Data Security
security.description: We take technical and organizational measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.
security.measures: Modern encryption methods, access control and regular security audits are used.

contact.title: 11. Contact Information
contact.description: For personal data processing questions, contact us through the feedback forms on the website or in the support section.
contact.response: We undertake to review your request within 30 days of receipt.

changes.title: 12. Policy Changes
changes.description: We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy.
changes.notification: Material changes will be communicated to users through the website or email at least 10 days before taking effect.
